title: Shorts: WeFarm
subtitle: Shorts: WeFarm
summary:
WeFarm is a free peer-to-peer service that enables farmers to share information via SMS, without the internet and without having to leave their farm. Farmers can ask questions on farming and receive crowd-sourced answers from other farmers around the world in minutes. In 2014, WeFarm was named one of the overall winners  Google Impact Challenge.

Amy Cooper spoke to Wefarm CEO Kenny Ewan for Farmerama at London Food Tech Week, 2017

Learn more about WeFarm
https://wefarm.org/

See Amy’s TedX talk for Secret Seed Society: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=7nUPqnsp8T4
